it.polimi.se2018.network.server

Class PlayerQueue

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.network.server.PlayerQueue

  • public class PlayerQueue
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a queue of players waiting for a match. When enough players are added to a queue, a new lobby is created.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PlayerQueue

        PlayerQueue(int numberOfPlayers,
            Server server)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        numberOfPlayers - Number of players for the matches that will be created by this queue
        server - Reference to the object. It will be used to call `newLobby`

    • Method Detail

      • add

        public void add(java.lang.String username)
        Add a new player to the queue. If players are enough, a new Lobby will be automatically added to server's lobbies. If queue is empty before adding (this is the first player to enter the lobby), start lobby timer
        Parameters:
        username - Username of the player to be added
